ygData.msgSnippet: Wow. I still remember playing my good ol Gladiator version 2.4. This game has taken HUUUGE steps. I ve got a bug for you and anyone else bored enough to fix!

Wow. I still remember playing my good 'ol Gladiator version 2.4. This game 
has taken HUUUGE steps. I've got a bug for you and anyone else bored enough 
to fix! If you play the game under a dos computer, then run win 3.11 and run 
Gladiator, it'll display a weird message and from then on no skills will need 
money.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
